sentence.text: Salivary gland tumor (ubiquitin-dependent ERAD pathway) is a rare tumor cardiac muscle tissue development, which exhibits broad-spectrum phenotypic, biological, and clinical heterogeneity.

We have deleted two major tumor suppressors, negative regulation of protein phosphorylation, a negative regulator of the PI3K pathway, and transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, the central signaling mediator of TGFÎ² pathway, in the murine salivary gland.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: Our results have shown that deletion of either negative regulation of protein phosphorylation or transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway in murine salivary gland resulted in pleomorphic adenomas, the most common tumor in human ubiquitin-dependent ERAD pathway patients.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
